'''Lump''' refers to any data element inside a [[WAD]] or a [[PK3]] archive. Essentially, any file in an archive is a lump.
A map, its [[BLOCKMAP]], [[SECTORS]], [[SSECTORS]], its [[BEHAVIOR]], and any graphics, sounds, or additional data items are all lumps. Text lumps like [[TEXTURES]], [[MAPINFO]], [[ANIMDEFS]] are the same. Note, custom lumps with arbitrary names can also be put in a [[PK3]]/[[WAD]].
In [[ZScript]] lumps can be found, and their contents can be read dynamically with the help of the '''{{struct|Wads}}''' struct.
